articles.author: Ryan Bort
articles.title: Pam Bondi Flatters Trump With Claim That 75% of America Would Be Dead if Not For Him - Rolling Stone
articles.description: Attorney General Pam Bondi told Donald Trump during a Cabinet meeting that he's saved the lives of 75 percent of Americans through fentanyl seizures.
articles.content: Every so often, Donald Trump assembles America’s most powerful grovelers at the White House to take turns telling him how great of a job he’s doing while the cameras are rolling. The president held h… [+3509 chars]

articles.title: More and more older Americans want to know their Alzheimer’s status, survey finds : Shots - Health News - NPR
articles.description: A survey of 1700 Americans 45 and older found that 79% would want to know if they were in the early stages of Alzheimer's.
articles.content:
Older Americans want to know if they are in the early stages of Alzheimer's and would happily take a blood test to find out, according to a national survey.
The survey of 1,700 people 45 and older, … [+4280 chars]
